metadata.title: StrawPoll: Create your poll in seconds
metadata.description: Making it easy to create instant, real-time polls and surveys for free. StrawPoll is the simplest way to create instant, real-time polls for free.

Main.description: Want to ask your friends where to go friday night or arrange a meeting with co-workers? Create a poll - and get answers in no time.

first.title: Use our advanced poll maker
first.description: A straw poll is a voting that can be used to help people to easily determine the opinion of a group or the public on some issue. Straw polls are very useful when only the majority opinion is important and not the opinion of each individual participant.

second.title: Schedule your meetings in no-time
second.description: StrawPoll Meetings is a great and simple tool to schedule meetings and other times with clients, colleagues or friends. A meeting poll is very helpful in situations where the opinion of each individual participant is important.

fakeDetection.title: Fake Detection
fakeDetection.description: By default, bots and VPN users are blocked from voting on straw polls.

deadlines.title: Deadlines
deadlines.description: Our polls run indefinitely. You can change that by setting a deadline.

emojiSupport.title: Emoji Support
emojiSupport.description: We support all Emojis natively. Feel free to use as many as you want!

liveResults.title: Live Results
liveResults.description: Evaluate your poll results in a pie chart or bar graph in real-time.

api.title: Poll API
api.description: We provide an easy to use API for poll creation and result analysis.

activeDevelopment.title: Active Development
activeDevelopment.description: We are continuously working on additional features and QoL updates.
